mOnSelfDrivingChanged.description: Called when the self driving is turn on or off.

mOnDockingStateChanged.description: Called when the docking state changes.

mConsistData.description: Static information about the consist, it changes when rolling stock is added/removed or a container is loaded/unloaded.

mAtcData.description: Runtime data for the automatic train control. See struct for more info.

mTrackGraphID.description: The track this train is on.

FirstVehicle.description: Train are a doubly linked list, use TTrainIterator to iterate over a train.

mMultipleUnitMaster.description: This is the master locomotives that sends its input (throttle/brake/etc) to all other locomotives in the train.

mDockingState.description: The status for an ongoing dock, this is not saved, it's updated from the station we're docked to on load.

mSoundComponent.description: Sound component controlling all the moving/idle sounds for the train
